channel.title: Ronnieessss back!
channel.description:
[center]Ronnie finally started recording again with Falling in Reverse! :D Listen to his new single Raised by Wolves! Its awesome! [url=http://grooveshark.com/#/search?q=falling%20in%20reverse]http://grooveshark.com/#/search?q=falling%20in%20reverse[/url] [url=http://itunes.apple.com/us/album/raised-by-wolves-single/id439592052]http://itunes.apple.com/us/album/raised-by-wolves-single/id439592052[/url][/center]
[center][img]http://a5.mzstatic.com/us/r1000/120/Features/69/15/97/dj.woaouluf.170x170-75.jpg[/img][/center]

item.title: Ronnieessss back!
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

[quote=“rant, post:9, topic:398334”][quote author=Ix Soulcist xI link=topic=495468.msg3622776#msg3622776 date=1307579151]

been listening to falling in reverse since before they came out with this album, escape the fate sucks now we all know, but hopefully ronnie can do us all a favor and stay out of a fuckin fight.

Craig Mabbit has dissed Ronnie since he has been in prison which is the saddest, immature thing I’ve seen a band do, I don’t know what the band felt about it, but it seemed to be that neither Craig and the band themselves cared.

I’m sure Ronnie is coming back for vengeance, but if he doesn’t, I’ll respect him for that. The music he’s created such as Not Good Enough was excellent, and something I loved the most out all of his creations so far, we’ll see what else he has stored up inside of him.
[/quote]
true all i was saying was what use is the guy in jail?[/quote]Look what he did in jail… He built this all up while he was in there.

Read full topic

item.title: Ronnieessss back!
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“rant, post:9, topic:398334”][quote author=Ix Soulcist xI link=topic=495468.msg3622776#msg3622776 date=1307579151]

been listening to falling in reverse since before they came out with this album, escape the fate sucks now we all know, but hopefully ronnie can do us all a favor and stay out of a fuckin fight.

Craig Mabbit has dissed Ronnie since he has been in prison which is the saddest, immature thing I’ve seen a band do, I don’t know what the band felt about it, but it seemed to be that neither Craig and the band themselves cared.

I’m sure Ronnie is coming back for vengeance, but if he doesn’t, I’ll respect him for that. The music he’s created such as Not Good Enough was excellent, and something I loved the most out all of his creations so far, we’ll see what else he has stored up inside of him.
[/quote]
true all i was saying was what use is the guy in jail?[/quote]
I know, was just stating some things I felt like saying. Obviously he wasn’t of use at all, but he’s back and about time he has come back, as I said before, “we’ll see what else he has stored up inside of him”.

Read full topic

Craig Mabbit has dissed Ronnie since he has been in prison which is the saddest, immature thing I’ve seen a band do, I don’t know what the band felt about it, but it seemed to be that neither Craig and the band themselves cared.

I’m sure Ronnie is coming back for vengeance, but if he doesn’t, I’ll respect him for that. The music he’s created such as Not Good Enough was excellent, and something I loved the most out all of his creations so far, we’ll see what else he has stored up inside of him.[/quote]

item.title: Ronnieessss back!
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

rant:

been listening to falling in reverse since before they came out with this album, escape the fate sucks now we all know, but hopefully ronnie can do us all a favor and stay out of a fuckin fight.

Craig Mabbit has dissed Ronnie since he has been in prison which is the saddest, immature thing I’ve seen a band do, I don’t know what the band felt about it, but it seemed to be that neither Craig and the band themselves cared.

I’m sure Ronnie is coming back for vengeance, but if he doesn’t, I’ll respect him for that. The music he’s created such as Not Good Enough was excellent, and something I loved the most out all of his creations so far, we’ll see what else he has stored up inside of him.

Read full topic

I’m also listening to The Structure Falls and The Chariot something something song (He had a plan, to kill you in the end).

item.title: Ronnieessss back!
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

[quote=“marcbob, post:2, topic:398334”]Who?[/quote]THE BESTESTTTTSSSSSS SINGER EVA!!!
His new album is out the 27th I think. And yes Soulcist, I’ve been waiting since the first day he got out of jail. I got scared he quit there for awhile cause he didn’t post anything on his Facebook page. But he finally rewards us for following him this long!

Read full topic

item.title: Ronnieessss back!
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Well it’s about freaking time, I’ve been waiting until a new release has happened but haven’t heard from his since he got out of jail.

Thanks for this mate!

marcbob:

Who?

Ronnie Radke - Ex member from Escape The Fate
